frozen_definition.name: PaperStash
frozen_definition.signal_source: Note-taking app complaints about 'work well initially but become problematic as note collections grow' and difficulty with retrieval
frozen_definition.description: Digital shoebox for random notes and thoughts that prioritizes simple storage and powerful search over organization structure
frozen_definition.target_user: Note-takers overwhelmed by organizational systems who just want to dump thoughts and find them later
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Users struggle with notes being 'fragmented and scattered across different folders and tags'
frozen_definition.differentiation: Anti-organization approach vs. complex folder systems, prioritizes capture and search over structure
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes unlimited notes, advanced search filters, and cross-device sync

pricing.trial_strategy: Free for up to 200 notes, premium for unlimited storage and advanced search
